author: cnbc.com
title: Encore Capital Group: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ Encore Capital Group Inc. (ECPG) on Tuesday reported first-quarter net income of $21.8 million.
The San Diego-based company said it had profit of 83 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were 98 cents per share.
The results did not meet Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of five analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.03 per share.
The provider of debt-management and recovery services posted revenue of $326.8 million in the period, which also did not meet Street forecasts. Four analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $327.5 million.
Encore Capital Group shares have risen 7 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, shares hit $45.10, an increase of 36 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on ECPG at https://www.zacks.com/ap/ECPG
